properties.name: Los Angeles
properties.message: Known for its Mediterranean climate, ethnic diversity, and the entertainment industry.

properties.name: San Francisco
properties.message: Famous for the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz Island, and its historic cable cars.

properties.name: Sacramento
properties.message: The capital city of California, known for its historic Old Sacramento.

properties.name: San Diego
properties.message: Known for its beaches, parks, and the San Diego Zoo.

properties.name: San Jose
properties.message: The heart of Silicon Valley, known for its tech industry.
